### Boxplots

Here are the boxplots of transcriptomic gene expressions in lesional and non-lesional skin samples:

```{r boxplots}
transcriptome <- read.csv('../filter-data/transcriptome.csv')
sample_id <- transcriptome$X
transcriptome <- transcriptome[,-c(1)]
rownames(transcriptome) <- sample_id

boxplot()
```
